events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred on March 30, 2024, involving their vehicle and another on Main Street. They requested to open a claim immediately.
Based on the initial report, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicular collision causing damage.
An agent was assigned to handle the case and will coordinate all necessary follow-ups with the insured regarding the accident.
The insured received confirmation that their claim has been acknowledged and is now under review by the claims department.
The claims team requested accident reports, photos of vehicle damage, and a copy of the police report to proceed with the investigation.
The insured submitted all requested documents including police reports and vehicle photos to assist in the claim investigation process.
A formal investigation commenced to verify the details of the vehicle collision and assess the extent of damages reported by the insured.
The investigation has concluded, confirming the insured was not at fault and the damage estimate has been finalized by the adjuster.
A settlement offer was proposed to the insured based on the damage assessment and policy coverage limits, awaiting their response.
The insured responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of their claim.
The claim was officially approved following confirmation of agreement to the settlement terms from the insured.
Payment was processed and issued to the insured to cover the vetted damages to their vehicle as per the approved claim.
The claim case was officially closed after the insured confirmed receipt of payment and satisfaction with the claim resolution.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived securely for future reference and audit compliance.
